params.params: the parameters to initialize the project

returns.uniV3PoolAddress: address of uniswap v3 pool. We use this address as project id

initILOPool((address,int24,int24,uint256.notice: this function init an `ILO Pool` which will be used for sale and vest. One project can init many ILO Poolonly project admin can use this function

setDefaultDeadlineOffset(uint64).notice: set time offset for refund if project not launch

setFeeTaker(address).notice: set platform fee for decrease liquidity. Platform fee is imutable among all project's pools
